Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Life Technologies QuantStudio Dx RT-PCR Instrument
Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx RT-PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Quidel Lyra RSV + hMPV multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection of RSV and hMPV in respiratory swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection and identification of RSV and hMPV RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, to aid in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological factors.
